page.title: 19Living in Rural Wales
page.content: Many people who come here on holiday fall in love with the place the beauty, the reshness and clarity of the air, the friendliness of the people, the eneral lack of presure and and the quiet. Some come and settle and continue to enjoy all the beneits of the slow, easy way of life. Other find that there are disadvantaes they did not foresee - to some the solitude can be too much when even the postman leaves letters in a box at the gate. Shops are far away, entertainment scarce and many town amenities non-existent. We love it. It's our home.
